name: 尤尚邦
objective:
本課程之目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生必須利用暑假至機械、車輛、冷凍空調相關機構實習，參與校外合作企業或研發機構所提供之訓練，學習專業技術之運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核。學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告及現場訪評，撰寫實習成果報告交給系上保存，並給予評分。
The purpose of this course is to improve students' practical ability. Students must use summer vacation to practice in machinery, vehicles, refrigeration and air conditioning related institutions, participate in training provided by off-campus cooperative enterprises or R&D institutions, and learn the operation of professional technology. After the internship period expires, the internship institution must issue an internship certificate and performance assessment. Students must write an internship experience report, and then the instructor will write the internship achievement report to the department for preservation and score based on the student's experience report and on-site interview and evaluation.
schedule: 1-18 周，安排至企業實習、到單位培訓
scorePolicy:
50% 主管評分
50% 周誌、報告繳交
consultation: 教師諮商時間與聯絡請以 email 聯絡預約。
